text: Vanesa Ortega Godoy (born March 24, 1981 in MÃ¡laga) is a track and field athlete from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. She raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished in second in 400 meter T12 race. She raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Vanesa Ortega Godoy
